name: Adventure Island - Fun Journey
description:
Help penguins overcome difficulties to reach the castle. Beautiful graphics, the game interesting, very interesting, you can help him slip, jump, use cannon or rocket flight.
Amazing penguins reach out to help him in this Arctic adventure. Control penguin run and jump!

Fun Game!

feature:
A lot of fun - such as riding a rocket!
+ Unlock new level - well designed rich level!
+ Play with the game is so easy, so interesting!
